description: Creates a resource gateway for a service.

Value.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 256  
Update requires: No interruption

Key.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Update requires: No interruption

Tag.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Update requires: No interruption

IpAddressType.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: IPV4 | IPV6 | DUALSTACK  
Update requires: Replacement

VpcIdentifier.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 5  
Maximum Length: 50  
Update requires: Replacement

Ipv4AddressesPerEni.description: The number of IPv4 addresses to allocate per ENI for the resource gateway
Ipv4AddressesPerEni.markdownDescription:
The number of IPv4 addresses to allocate per ENI for the resource gateway

---

Required: No  
Type: Integer  
Update requires: No interruption

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 17  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((rgw-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:resourcegateway/rgw-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Arn.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:resourcegateway/rgw-[0-9a-z]{17}$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

SubnetIds.description: The ID of one or more subnets in which to create an endpoint network interface.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SubnetIds.markdownDescription:
The ID of one or more subnets in which to create an endpoint network interface.

---

Required: Yes  
Type: Array  
Update requires: Replacement

SecurityGroupIds.description: The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface.

items.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Update requires: No interruption

SecurityGroupIds.markdownDescription:
The ID of one or more security groups to associate with the endpoint network interface.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

Name.markdownDescription:
---

Required: Yes  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 3  
Maximum Length: 40  
Pattern: ^(?!rgw-)(?![-])(?!.*[-]$)(?!.*[-]{2})[a-z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: Replacement

Id.markdownDescription:
---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 17  
Maximum Length: 2048  
Pattern: ^((rgw-[0-9a-z]{17})|(arn:[a-z0-9\-]+:vpc-lattice:[a-zA-Z0-9\-]+:\d{12}:resourcegateway/rgw-[0-9a-z]{17}))$  
Update requires: No interruption
Read only property: Yes

Arn.markdownDescription:

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 20  
Maximum Length: 2048
